verbs.description: The European Union [V: is] hitting back at Trump 's steel and aluminum tariffs with import duties on an array of U.S. products .
[ARG0: The European Union] is [V: hitting] [ARGM-DIR: back] [ARG2: at Trump 's steel and aluminum tariffs] [ARGM-MNR: with import duties on an array of U.S. products] .
